description:
Skcript is a technology consulting firm helping business be technology-forward.

Skcript advises clients on new technology, strategy and new product innovation. We help companies with practical strategies to venture into emerging technologies to disrupt their industry. Founded in 2013, Skcript has served more than 100 customers across the world in a variety of industy and sector.
